name: Fitness Plus
description: Join Fitness Plus for a high-intensity workout program designed to help you achieve your fitness goals.

name: Iron Gym
description: Get strong and build muscle at Iron Gym with our state-of-the-art equipment and expert trainers.

name: FitLife Fitness Center
description: FitLife Fitness Center offers a variety of classes and personalized training options to help you stay fit and healthy.

name: Body Sculpt
description: Shape your body and achieve a toned physique with our Body Sculpt program that combines strength training and cardio exercises.

name: FlexFit Gym
description: FlexFit Gym offers a range of classes, from yoga to kickboxing, to cater to all fitness levels and preferences.

name: Core Fitness Studio
description: Join Core Fitness Studio for core-focused workouts that will strengthen your abs, back, and overall stability.

name: Power Lift Gym
description: Power Lift Gym is the perfect place for weightlifters and strength enthusiasts looking to push their limits.

name: Cardio Zone
description: Achieve your cardiovascular fitness goals at Cardio Zone with our diverse range of cardio machines and classes.

name: CrossFit Fusion
description: Experience the high-intensity workouts and camaraderie of CrossFit Fusion for a total body transformation.
